description:
If you're a Notion creator, I've made this set of 3D marketing models just for you. Nothing to explain.


Value

  • No more 2D screenshots
  • 3D Designs to make your template stand out.
  • No more paying a designer. No more downloading a photoshop mockup.
  • Ready to set up in under 5 minutes.
  • Get once. Use for a lifetime. For unlimited templates and use cases.
  • Ready to download templates for 10 platforms


Supported platforms:

  • Twitter
  • Gumroad (Header + Thumbnails)
  • Prototion
  • Notion way
  • Notio Utopia
  • Instagram (Post + Story)
  • Product hunt
  • Notion everything
  • Reddit
  • facebook


What you need?

  • A figma account (it's free. Go to figma.com to create one)
  • and 5 minutes!



Before you hit that "I want this!" button, consider following me on twitter : ). I have many advanced versions planned for this that you might not want to miss.

https://twitter.com/naman_designs
